mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_NOTICE WHERE IS_DEL = 'N'
SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TTL ,BOARD_CNTN ,CRT_DT ,MOD_DT ,REG_MEM_ID ,IS_DEL FROM BOARD_NOTICE WHERE IS_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_NOTICE ( BOARD_TTL, BOARD_CNTN, CRT_DT, MOD_DT, REG_MEM_ID, IS_DEL) VALUES ( #{boardTtl}, #{boardCntn}, NOW(), NOW(), #{regMemId}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_NOTICE WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND is_del = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY_NOTICE WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND is_del = 'N'
SELECT REPLY_NO ,BOARD_NO ,REPLY_CNTN ,UP_REPLY_NO ,IS_DEL ,REG_MEM_ID ,CRT_DT ,MOD_DT FROM REPLY_NOTICE WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND is_del = 'N' ORDER BY crt_dt desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY_NOTICE( BOARD_NO, REPLY_CNTN, UP_REPLY_NO, IS_DEL, REG_MEM_ID, CRT_DT, MOD_DT ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{replyCntn}, #{upReplyNo}, 'N', #{regMemId}, NOW(), NOW() )
